name: threejs-demo
description: Three.js Three.js is a JavaScript library used to create and display animated 3D computer graphics in a web browser. It uses WebGL, a JavaScript API for rendering interactive 3D and 2D graphics within any compatible web browser without the use of plug-ins. Three.js provides a set of tools and abstractions that allow developers to create complex 3D scenes with ease, including cameras, lights, materials, geometry, and more.
